description: Whether you're spending lazy Sundays at home or weekends camping out with friends, the Men's Fairfax Lightweight Flannel is your go-to, classically cut flannel perfect for all-around fall fun. Stay warm and extra comfy with this lightweight flannel cut from a blend of cotton and recycled polyester that delivers rich buttery softness. Designed to go with just about anything in your closet—from your favorite denim jeans to your trusted Marmot hiking bottoms—the Fairfax Lightweight Flannel is a must-have for cooler weather adventures on and off the trail.
name: Marmot Fairfax Lightweight Flannel LS - Mens
